tweet: It is 100x easier for people to understand new ideas by analogy vs. from first principles.  Corollary: Facebook's crypto project and JP Morgan's "crypto"currency are going to drive more BTC/ETH/XMR/ZEC/etc. adoption than practically anything crypto could do on its own right now.
Updated information thread regarding the scheduled protocol upgrade of March 9:  https://t.co/qQvU3puoC2
